content:
I just wanted to share a new blog article I've written Fullstack Roc + htmxâ€”Data Table.

I had a business trip recently and thought I might use the travel time to build a data table.

This is a continuation of my experiments exploring htmx for fullstack web applications in lukewilliamboswell/roc-htmx-playground.

The main motivation for writing this up is so that I can share it in our online meetup... I find it easier to talk about after writing something to cover the interesting points.

In summary, I've found it awesome combining roc and htmx, and highly encourage others to try it out too.
PS if you see any mistakes, let me know :smiley:
